title: Gift of Boats (1U46)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert an Elf ally. Plays to your support area. When the fellowship moves from a river during the fellowship phase, the move limit for this turn is +1.
Lore:	”'They will not sink, lade them as you will; but they are wayward if mishandled.'”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Game text is an erratum.
